skinlines.description: Out in the wasteland, the only gospel a Road Warrior needs is the hum of an engine, and the only prayers they hear are the curses of their enemies.

skinlines.name: Storybook
skinlines.description: Once upon a time, there was a group of storybook characters brought to life from the page...

skinlines.name: Fables
skinlines.description: Every culture has their own folklore surrounding legends and monsters. Are these myths a figment of our imagination, stories passed down through generations to explain the unexplainable? Or are they based in a truth hidden from the rest of the world?

skinlines.name: Odyssey
skinlines.description: From the urbanized coreworlds to the outermost edge of the galaxy, adventure awaits! The great Demaxian Empire ignores the objections of the Templar Order and the criminal Syndicate alike in their pursuit of oraa mysterious golden essence that serves as the lifeblood of all civilization, and promises untold power to those who can wield it for themselves

skinlines.name: Bilgewater: Curse of the Drowned
skinlines.description: 'Neath waxing moon and rising tides, dark magicks stir and secrets hide. Where salt and blood and fell winds flow as above the waves, so too below.

skinlines.name: World Champions: 2017
skinlines.description: Congratulations to your Worlds winners for 2017: Samsung Galaxy!

skinlines.name: Dreadnova
skinlines.description: A criminal network of ruthless mercenaries who rule entire swaths of the galaxy, Dreadnova has grown powerful since its founders fled Genesis Industries' ranks with stolen exosuit plans in tow. Now they push back against the Royal Space Military's efforts to impose Genesis' corporate order, bringing to bear all the firepower the black market has to offer.

skinlines.name: Battle of the God-Kings
skinlines.description: At the end of a dark timeline, two kings descended from the primordial gods of Order and Chaos lead vast armies in one final clash.

skinlines.name: Kaiju
skinlines.description: From the depths of the planet, they rise: colossal entities of horror and hunger, mightier than armies and mountains. Their motivations are uncertain; their designs, unknown. The one thing that is clear is that we will not survive them... unless we create the means to stop them.

skinlines.name: Omen of the Dark
skinlines.description: This story of a cursed queen and the wretched followers of her order makes unpleasant bedside banter for parents and their children. But lessons last longer when the tale is gripped in shadow, which swirls in dreams and shapes the souls of impressionable youth. The nightmares are just nightmares, after all... or so the adults pray.

skinlines.name: Immortal Journey
skinlines.description: Long ago, in an ancient land, many souls gathered beneath the gods to test the limits of their power. Foolish and arrogant, brave and just, their journeys are written into the immortal pages of history

skinlines.name: Traditional
skinlines.description: Honoring the initial designs of reworked champions.

skinlines.name: Collector's Edition
skinlines.description: Everything feels better when it comes inside a Collector's Edition box, be it digital or physical.

skinlines.name: PAX
skinlines.description: PAX: the intersection of all things gaming, where play is celebrated and immortal bonds are formed.

skinlines.name: Steel Legion
skinlines.description: In the shadow of all-out warfare between Genesis Industries and Dreadnova, ruined lives are just collateral damage. The Steel Legion is a vigilante organization operated out of run-down battleground planets, founded by refugees and armed by weapons crafted from scraps of rubble. If no one else will defend them, the people must defend themselves.

skinlines.name: Infernal
skinlines.description: Scorching an entire world takes unimaginable strength, which is why the Ashen Lord called upon his legions of Infernals to lend their flames. From the darkest depths, they each bring their own terrible powers to bear, though not all answer their call with the same burning enthusiasm.

skinlines.name: Death Sworn
skinlines.description: Eager to claim more souls for the underworld, Death sends the souls of fallen warriors as Death Sworn back to the mortal plane, where they serve their master's terrible bidding with relish.

skinlines.name: Trick-or-Treat
skinlines.description: You better hope you have the good stuff. You know, Piltover Pops, Strikebreaker Sours, Dark Star Chocolate Bars... 'Cause if you don't, the kids on this block have some tricks up their sleeves.

skinlines.name: Zombies VS Slayers
skinlines.description: Brains...

skinlines.name: Praetorian
skinlines.description: Nothing is safe from the cold clutches of the Praetorians, a mechanical plague tearing through spacetime. For as hard as the Remembrancers fight to stave off the eradication of all life, deep down they are filled with fear, knowing that at some point they'll tire, while the Praetorians never will.

skinlines.name: K/DA
skinlines.description: There is a place between fantasy and reality where anything can happen. You have the power to be anyone, and do anything. It is your dream. In our in-between world, K/DA feels confident and strong. We can do anything, and so can you. -Kai'Sa

skinlines.name: Coven
skinlines.description: The witches lay in wait, a sisterhood of frightening pulchritude, their hopes whispered forth from desacralized lips. They speak of the bloating corpses of Old Gods, of ancient rites carried out with magics long forgotten to mortal mind, of the return of what they call "order", but others call "suffering". Hark! Mankind's end fast approaches.

skinlines.name: Eclipse
skinlines.description: Long ago, an order of monastic knights slew the vile gods of the old world, using esoteric powers granted by the moon and sun. Now the world has grown dark and violent, as those selfsame deities prepare their returnchallenged only by the light of the eclipse.

skinlines.name: Astronauts
skinlines.description: Astronauts, hijinks, and adorable alien meeps! Defying gravity is just another day for these adventurous space protectors, as they defend planet M33p and traverse the grand cosmos that awaits them.

skinlines.name: Arcanists
skinlines.description: Right outside the academy doors is a world filled with magic... and danger. The professors caution the young wizards and witches to stay within the safety of the school grounds, grow their power, and study wellbut where is the fun in that when adventure awaits just beyond the bend?

skinlines.name: Papercraft
skinlines.description: Do you see a saddle on my back?" chirped the phoenix. "I am no pack-bird. And that yeti will weigh down our flight." The boy looked on, his perfect plan rejected. But then, a smile creased his face. After all, in this world of folded foliage and crinkled creeks, adventure is always just beyond the bend.

skinlines.name: Albion
skinlines.description: Once the dominion of fallen Elven empires, the vast forests of Albion are now home to kingdoms and brigands and elves and free men in equal measure. There's power to be found in the imperial ruins, should anyone be bold enough to venture deep into the woods to seek it

skinlines.name: Cats Versus Dogs
skinlines.description: The oldest rivalry the world has ever known: man's best friend pitted against the internet's greatest heroes. Only one faction will emerge victorious from the gnawing maw of battle between cats and dogs. Hopefully they don't get their fur too dirty: the only thing worse than losing is bathtime.

skinlines.name: Wonders of the World
skinlines.description: Individuals hailing from the far-flung universe of "Earth," where giant statues come to life and everyone is wearing a fun hat. It's a lot like Runeterra, if you think about it.

skinlines.name: Day Job
skinlines.description: It's a living!

skinlines.name: Definitely Not
skinlines.description: Is that a robot in glasses and a trenchcoat? Of course not. Do your eyes perceive a beast man in a onesie? Better get those eyes checked, because they're wrong. Isn't Draven too modest to wear his own head? How foolish you must feel to even ask. And that laser squid? Definitely human. Definitely.

skinlines.name: High Society
skinlines.description: The only thing more impressive than their wealth is their tax avoidance skills.

skinlines.name: Dunkmaster
skinlines.description: There are two types of people in this world: those that dunk, and those who get dunked. If you don't know which one you are, then watch out! 'Cuz you're about to GET DUNKED!

skinlines.name: Commando
skinlines.description: Just your average bottomless pit of scum and villainy. Bosses vie for power; pacts are made and broken; friendships meet their end on the edge of twisted, subtle knives. And yet, there's something more to this city. Something undiscovered, imperceptible. Something... infinite.

skinlines.name: Invaders
skinlines.description: True to their title, these nefarious alien meeps have stumbled upon a power they don't quite understand. Unfortunately, misery loves company. Those who come into contact with the invaders almost always come out on the other side just a little more evil and purple!

skinlines.name: Mad Scientists
skinlines.description: The job requirements are pretty simple: we're looking for at least five years of experience in applied sciences, your last peer-reviewed paper, and two references. Oh, and an evil laugh. Actually, put that at the top of the list.

skinlines.name: World Champions: 2018
skinlines.description: Congratulations to your Worlds winners for 2018: Invictus Gaming!

skinlines.name: Forgotten Depths
skinlines.description: Sit down, my child, and listen close. The ocean is a wonder, the foaming waves that reach our peaceful shores a deceitful invitation. For what lies beneath that endless blue is a world beyond our imagining. Of kingdoms ruined and monsters fierce, floating down in those forgotten depths.

skinlines.name: Conqueror
skinlines.description: Commemorating the League of Legends Mid-Season Invitational and Spring Split tournaments.

skinlines.name: Goth
skinlines.description: It's not a phase.

skinlines.name: Silver Age
skinlines.description: The rift's greatest superheroes and most dastardly villains, available at a comic store near you!

skinlines.name: Glacial
skinlines.description: The world is frozen, with few left to remember its cause. Old terrors stir from beneath the ice, ready to claim the world once more. The flame of hope remains, but the days are short, and the nights long

skinlines.name: Battle Academia
skinlines.description: At these institutions, only the strong survive. Though they were founded to honor their God Weapon, the students at each academy strive to make its strength their own on their path to glory. Whether it's the classroom, or the battlefield, dominate the competition.

skinlines.name: Medieval
skinlines.description: Hark, ye knights and knaves, for these lands are under the royal protection of the King and Queen! Make way, make way!

skinlines.name: Rift Hospital
skinlines.description: Take a seat. The doctor will be right with you.

skinlines.name: Demonic
skinlines.description: Even in the kingdom of Hell, fervent personalities jockey for higher standing, gambling with the souls of mortals in their power plays for the dark lord's favor.

skinlines.name: Demacia Vice
skinlines.description: As Ahri locks in her character on the start screen, the synth-heavy score fills the arcade. Her button taps aren't random, but perfectly calculated as she guides her champ through the crime-filled Demacian streets. A crowd gathers, intent on watching Ahri finally beat the high score, set by her only days ago.

skinlines.name: Heavy Metal
skinlines.description: Audiences gather from all over the world for a chance to witness the greatest robot fighters throw down in RiotCorp's gladiatorial arenas, eager for the chance to be crowned the Full Metal Robot Fighting League Champion or break down trying.

skinlines.name: Star Guardian Season 3
skinlines.description: Ahri's old squad resurfaces, changed from the events that once tore them apart... and followed by a threat beyond anything the Star Guardians have ever faced. Can the group move past old grudges and save themselves from annihilation? Or will they simply be the next victims of the Twilight Star?

skinlines.name: True Damage
skinlines.description: What is True Damage? Man, True Damage is the future! It's a collective of the best artists from around the world, coming together with the best collaboration, to make the best hip-hop music. We're five steps ahead of the game. Everyone else has gotta catch up. -Ekko

skinlines.name: Cops and Robbers
skinlines.description: Nobody puts in the work like the Piltover Police Department. Who else can lock up the most sugar-laden donuts inside their merciless stomachs, rack up the highest of overtimes, and ignore even the most menial of paperwork? The criminals may be taking advantage of it, but even they wish they had the same work ethic.

skinlines.name: Crimson Elite
skinlines.description: We can neither confirm nor deny the Crimson Elite's involvement in any criminal activities and request all inquiries be directed to local authorities.

skinlines.name: Dreadknights
skinlines.description: Brought back to life by mysterious ancient magic, these undead knights are the only remnants of a storied history, lost to time. They'll protect what once was theirs, at any cost to mortal life.

skinlines.name: Dawnbringer
skinlines.description: Order and light reign through deities of dawn, bringing structure to a nascent world locked in conflict with the forces of night.

skinlines.name: Nightbringer
skinlines.description: Chaos and darkness reign through deities of night, bringing change to a static world locked in conflict with the forces of dawn.

skinlines.name: Bloodstone
skinlines.description: Terrors abound in the depths of night, with none as fearsome as the Bloodstone cults. Shrieks fill the air in their presence, while the streets run red, for their master hungers and must be satiated.

skinlines.name: Mecha Kingdoms
skinlines.description: The Great Kingdoms warred for generations until the arrival of a new enemy. To fight back, they are blessed with gifts from the heavens. Will they rise above their past to save their future?

skinlines.name: Freljord
skinlines.description: The harsh, frozen north rarely sees travelers from other lands. Those that brave its wilds are met with hostile nature and unwelcoming hordes. Lucky are the few that survive to return to the nation they call home.

skinlines.name: Blackfrost
skinlines.description: The Ice Witch lets none slumber; each fallen friend and foe in her domain rises anew to fight by her side. Her dark magic twists their appearance, creating glacial golems with hearts of black, unmelting ice.

skinlines.name: World Champions: 2019
skinlines.description: Congratulations to your Worlds winners for 2019: FunPlus Phoenix!

skinlines.name: PsyOps
skinlines.description: The crown jewel of military black ops, the PsyOps unit are an elite team of psychic soldiers deployed against rogue militaries and supernatural threats. Officially, they don't exist. But when conventional warfare won't cut it and the stakes are no less than the fate of the world, PsyOps answers the call.

skinlines.name: Black Rose Group
skinlines.description: A psychic paramilitary unit of fearsome power, the Black Rose Group hopes to create a new global order with their ferocious human bioweapons.

skinlines.name: Dragonmancers
skinlines.description: Majestic dragons dwell in remote places of wild beauty, avoiding mortal affairs outside of rarely bestowing their gifts on only a select few. The Dragonmancers are those fortunate and powerful enough to have gained the ultimate blessing. Whether they then use that for good or for evil is up to them, and anyone strong enough to stop them.

skinlines.name: Galactic
skinlines.description: The War of the Broken Moon has ravaged our galaxy for near a hundred cycles. And still... there is no end in sight.

skinlines.name: Ruined
skinlines.description: The Harrowing spreads its Black Mist across Runeterra, corrupting indiscriminately. Some, in its presence, are swayed to follow the Ruined King, believing their goals aligned. But Viego wants only the return of Isolde; he has no allies. The Ruined who aid him in halting the Sentinels are mere pawns in a broken-hearted lover's game.

skinlines.name: Shan Hai Scrolls
skinlines.description: Within the fabled Shan Hai Scrolls, gods and mythical creatures roam magical lands, wielding the power of the elements. Some are content to live with the palette they've been given, while others wish to jump beyond the borders and paint their lives with a new brush.

skinlines.name: Crystal Rose
skinlines.description: Romance and joy are in the air at the yearly Crystal Rose Festival, where adversaries meet on peaceful, neutral ground to share a night of dancing, merriment, and making wishes for the future. Everyone is expected to leave their weapons at the door as a promise for a better tomorrow.

skinlines.name: Withered Rose
skinlines.description: The Crystal Rose Festival welcomes all who believe in its dream of a peaceful tomorrow, though many have grown disenchanted with the whole affair. Those who make up the Withered Rose wish to see it come to an end. But no one is immune to the festival's charm; perhaps they too will be swept away by the evening's beauty and have a change of heart.

skinlines.name: Lunar Beast
skinlines.description: Each year, a mischievous Lunar Beast arrives in the mortal realm, drawn to the New Year's celebrations. And each year, the corresponding Lunar God selects a squad of chosen champions to lead the beast on a merry chase and protect the city from the creature's playful rampage. The Lunar Parade is a beloved part of the New Year's festivities and the Beast itself brings good luck once it's been lulled to rest by the squad's efforts. When a Lunar Beast is well-entertained and well-rested, it always signals a prosperous New Year!

skinlines.name: Bees!
skinlines.description: Bzzz. Bzzz bzzz bzzz. Bzzz! Bzzz, bzz, bzz bzz bzz. Bzzz...

skinlines.name: Space Groove
skinlines.description: In a groovy galaxy a million disco infernos away, a mysterious energy known only as The Groove brings music and prosperity to trillions of galactic citizens. But when the alien overlord Lissandra and her army of Harsh Vibes begin to enslave planets and suppress disco music, a new age of heroes rises to stop her, and keep the party grooving.

skinlines.name: World Champions: 2020
skinlines.description: Congratulations to your Worlds winners for 2020: DAMWON Gaming!

skinlines.name: Sentinels of Light
skinlines.description: Though their numbers are few, the Sentinels of Light share a storied history. For years they've fought back the Harrowing, aided by ancient relic-stone weaponry that channels their very souls into a powerful light. But all that matters now is the battle ahead, as the Ruined King lays waste to Runeterra, all to dance with his queen once more.

skinlines.name: Cyber Pop
skinlines.description: In the vibrant underground of Sound City, hackers, skaters, rebels, and rogues band together away from the prying eyes of powerful cyber-corporate overlords.

skinlines.name: Crime City Nightmare
skinlines.description: If corruption and illegality existed on a map, Valoran City would be its center. A breeding ground for all things depraved, there are no depths too deep from which evil can be found, and the horrors that lurk there are eager to spread their influence.

skinlines.name: Phoenixmancers
skinlines.description: Only the truest hearts are blessed by the divine fenghuang, a legendary phoenix who watches over the world. Her champions receive a single feathereach one containing unimaginable elemental power, granting them the means needed to protect all that is innocent and good from forces lurking in the shadows.

skinlines.name: Pentakill III: The Lost Chapter
skinlines.description: In a realm consecrated to dark and uncaring gods, where mortals clash in ceaseless, bloody sagas of metal, one band rose above all others: Pentakill, chosen of the Noisome Host. Now revered in temples and arenas across the land, their supremacy has become absolutethough a time of change is approaching, and the cycle may soon begin anew...

skinlines.name: Porcelain
skinlines.description: In a world where ancient spirits and magical creatures thrive in the periphery of modern society, powerful porcelain artifacts called the Zodiac Relics are key to unlocking immense power. They are kept safe by the Protectors: immortal guardians tasked with keeping the Relics out of the wrong hands.

skinlines.name: Shockblade
skinlines.description: Bearing weapons imbued with lightning magic through the deadly Cloud Ritual, Shockblades are an order of mysterious shinobi warriors tasked with protecting humankind from malevolent spirits and monsters. They travel between the mortal and spirit realms to chase down threats no one else can touch, safeguarding the future for all denizens of the mortal world.

skinlines.name: Ashen Knights
skinlines.description: Many ages long past, a great king waged a glorious war: to break the shackles of magic on the world, so that mankind could forge its own destiny. Yet upon severing the final font of enchantment, the king was lost, the foundations of the world crumbled, and his once-legendary knights were left alone to madness, ruin, and ash.

skinlines.name: World Champions: 2021
skinlines.description: Congratulations to your Worlds winners for 2021: Edward Gaming!

skinlines.name: Ocean Song
skinlines.description: Nothing exudes the "beach vibes and cool tunes" lifestyle more than the Ocean Song Festival. From Seraphine's mellow songs to Yone's experimental DJ set, there's a vibe for everyone, so feel the sand between your toes, taste the salty air, and lose yourself to the best music of the summer.

skinlines.name: Snow Moon
skinlines.description: As the Snow Moon rises beyond the humbling mountains of Ionia, a chill passes across the land. Those who worship in its namea cult of unwavering assassinscommence their ritual. With snow comes purification, a cleansing only possible through the sacrifice of one's humanity.

skinlines.name: Star Guardian Season 4
skinlines.description: Ancient enemies appear in a Valoran City scarred by Zoe's invasion, now defended by a new generation of Star Guardians. As darkness gathers in the skies above, Kai'Sa and Akali prepare their untested squad for a fight with forces beyond their comprehension... and the true threat that awaits beyond.

skinlines.name: Monster Tamers
skinlines.description: Who are we? We're Monster Tamers! We protect the world when it's in danger! When others would flee, we follow the roar. We tame the monster and use the CORE. And with our new friends by our side, we'll hop and run and swim and glide! We'll go anywhere, no matter how far. Because we're Monster Tamers! That's who we are!

skinlines.name: Spirit Guard
skinlines.description: Udyr spent almost a decade training in Ionia with the monks of the Hirana Monastery, learning to control and master his spiritual abilities. At last, when the Freljord called him home, he chose to stay and complete his training. In the time since then, Udyr has become part of the Ionian landscape, both spiritual and mortal, as he works with Lee Sin and Karma to return balance to the wartorn land.

skinlines.name: Ruination
skinlines.description: One thousand years ago, the last king of Camavor chose to follow his heart at the expense of his country. So powerful was his love that fate intervened, and only ruin followed.

skinlines.name: Zenith Games
skinlines.description: It's 2122, a year of firsts for the Zenith Games. Robot referees are taking to the field, the sport of Hammerjack is making its competitive debut, and after years of talks, augmented humans are finally allowed to compete. All that's left is seeing who will win.

skinlines.name: Elementalist
skinlines.description: A kingdom hangs on the edge of ruin as an army of titanic elemental beasts wage war on humanity. The last line of defense is held by a lone warrior queen, Elementalist Lux. To save her people, she must look within and reveal her true nature... no matter what form it takes.

skinlines.name: Legacy
skinlines.description: Treasures from days long passed, glimmering just within reach.

skinlines.name: Urf the Manatee
skinlines.description: In loving memory of Urf, a gentle sea cow warrior who now practices with his spatula in the shallow marshes of the great beyond. Good night, sweet prince.

skinlines.name: Surprise Party
skinlines.description: Who doesn't like a surprise party? The guest list is done, everybody's bought their presents, and the food's going to be great. We even got a clown! This'll be one to remember. Just don't tell Amumu.

skinlines.name: Fright Night
skinlines.description: Bounding across the land on gargantuan frog legs, the Toadstool Boarding House attracts lodgers of the most frightful variety. Regardless of where it settles, there is always a monster in need of a place to stay, and Mother Glasc is always there to welcome them into the family with open arms. And an endless labyrinth of rooms ensures that none are ever turned away.

skinlines.name: Spirit Blossom
skinlines.description: The Spirit Blossom Festival is an ancient and celebrated time in Ionia, when the door to the spirit world is opened, the dead return to their loved ones, and spirits of all manner turn their eyes towards the living. From the benevolent Kanmei, to the obsessive Akanatheir stories play out again and again, like shadows on a paper lantern.

skinlines.name: Bewitching
skinlines.description: Who said witches can't have fun? Whoever it was, they're probably a frog now. Or some other cursed vermin, doomed to forever wander the streets, watching the eve's celebrations from afar. Pretty harsh punishment, but what did you expect? They may know how to throw a party, but at the end of the night, they're still witches!

skinlines.name: DJ
skinlines.description: Feel the bass. Hear the beat. Let the music move you.

skinlines.name: Popstar
skinlines.description: When you're at the top of the charts, no one can bring you down.

skinlines.name: Three Honors
skinlines.description: Society has become increasingly individualistic and closed off under the Essent's rule. People are encouraged to care only about themselves, so nobody trusts each other. As leader of the long-dead Order of Solace, Malzahar seeks to bring harmony to this dissonant world through the uplifting aura of Solace. He knows that only by coming together can they inspire a better world.

skinlines.name: Bilgewater: Mercs
skinlines.description: Bounty hunters, outlaws, and pirates alike swarm to Bilgewater's infamous slaughter docks like flies to butcher's trimmings. It's a hard life on these seas, but the reward can be well worth it... Bearded Lady permiting.

skinlines.name: Chronicle
skinlines.description: Legends are tested, shaped, and forged by their pasts.

skinlines.name: Curse of the Void
skinlines.description: Should the scourge of the Void spread across Runeterra, all will bow to its twisted evolution. Swarming, hungering, wanting, the Void spares no creature and suffers no defeat.

skinlines.name: Otherroads
skinlines.description: A featherknight flaps its wings, and halfway across Runeterra, an Ocean Drake surfaces. Our lives play out, fickle as words on parchment; the paths before us unknown and exciting. What if the road taken instead... was the one less traveled?

skinlines.name: Beta
skinlines.description: Who let these stay in the build???? Don't tell Legal.

skinlines.name: Soulstealer
skinlines.description: Souls are life, light, powerand in a world without mercy, they are stolen and consumed by remorseless masters of death.

skinlines.name: Triumphant
skinlines.description: Awarded to players who won a League of Legends sponsored tournament.

skinlines.name: True Warrior
skinlines.description: For a true warrior, only strength and honor will echo through eternity.

skinlines.name: Empyrean
skinlines.description: The first Empyrean, Pyke, tears through the realms on a destructive rampage against his counterparts, birthing new Empyreans in the process. Who will reign supreme as these new powerhouses emerge, and what will they do with their rapidly dwindling time left?

skinlines.name: Winterblessed
skinlines.description: When the air grows crisp and the first snow falls, look to the sky, for Polaris will appear. Do not be afraid, for if you've been virtuous without expectation, you might be rewarded with the Aurora's blessings. But remember: no matter how you act, you cannot take your fortunes for granted, because Polaris comes every year, and no one escapes punishment.

skinlines.name: Mythmaker
skinlines.description: Long ago, the defeat of the Great Beast Galio gave rise to Lunar New Year traditions that are carried on through the retelling of that epic tale. Within the story itself lies a living world all its ownbut when the world of the story is suddenly interrupted, the characters must work together to fix the mess and see their own myth through.

skinlines.name: Heartthrobs and Heartaches
skinlines.description: The preppy and perfectly poised Heartthrob clique don't have much in common with the Heartache crew, who would much rather be ditching class to hang out at the skatepark. But they agree on one thing: they've had it with this silly made up holiday dedicated to people catching feelings. So why can't they seem to shake the butterflies from their stomachs?

skinlines.name: Broken Covenant
skinlines.description: For years the Aspirant congregation has fought the Neverghaast sect over Aspira, the breath of life. To the congregation, Aspira is a gift one returns upon death to enter the afterlife. But the Neverghaast, cursed with an eternal thirst for breaths, believe there is only one life and it must be lived to excess. The war rages on, with no end in sight...

skinlines.name: Faerie Court
skinlines.description: All fae nobility are servants to nature's will, carrying out the natural order and the turning of seasons with their magic. Beneath that higher purpose, however, a constant game of political intrigue plays out in luxurious courts of silk, gossamer, and gold. Power, after allmagical, natural, or politicalalways inspires competition.

skinlines.name: Inkshadow
skinlines.description: On the outskirts of Rabadon City, a dilapidated temple houses the last hope for Rabadon's people: the Inkshadow Warriors. Each one sacrifices what is most important to them in order to make a contract with ancient spirits, who imbue them with magic tattoos so powerful, even the Cabal trembles. They are victims no more. It is time to take back their home.

skinlines.name: Nightbringer and Dawnbringer
skinlines.description: Timeless is the conflict between the Nightbringers and Dawnbringers. On one side, the forces of chaos and darkness bring change, while on the other, the forces of order and light bring structure. It is these gods and their descendents that shape a nascent world, and who can say whether the future will yield brighter days... or darker nights.

skinlines.name: World Champions: 2022
skinlines.description: Congratulations to your Worlds winners for 2022: DRX!

skinlines.name: Crystalis Motus
skinlines.description: Motus was a world bound to magic, but after the purge, everything collapsed. Centuries later, civilization is scattered, nature has reclaimed the cities, and magic's back in the form of Prismae Crystals. All it wants is to spread, and while some can use its power safely, others lose themselves to its pull and are taken over. So begins the Prismae Wars.

skinlines.name: Soul Fighter
skinlines.description: Their souls awaken by trial: one fought on a battlefield or in the very trenches of the mind. Each is granted unique abilities reflective of their nature and the power to conjure forth the very essence of their spirit. Some hone their strength, temper it with training... Others will use it only as a weapon to destroy. They are... SOUL FIGHTERS!

skinlines.name: Street Demons
skinlines.description: In Styxbridge City, demons, creatures, and humans live side-by-side. Every year, a street art festival is held, culminating in a friendly competition to see who can make the biggest and boldest graffiti: TagFest!

skinlines.name: La Ilusin
skinlines.description: The Eidola Vida were once mortal but, upon death, were reborn as spirits of life from their families' love. The Eidola Muerte were forgotten souls who, in death, roamed the afterlife until they found their own makeshift families. Both sides cannot be seen, only felt through their Ardor: magical flames that either help cultivate life or extinguish it.

skinlines.name: HEARTSTEEL
skinlines.description:
HEARTSTEEL is the hottest new band on the scene, featuring artists like Kayn and Ezreal
It's all of our band!
Calm down, Sett.
Wait, which magazine is this for again, K'Sante?
Please try to focus!
Hey Yone, can we just get on stage already?
We areoh, well, Aphelios just walked off

skinlines.name: Primal Ambush
skinlines.description: Those lucky enough to be born with glowing markings on their skin are revered among their people as Favorclaw. These special Tigrasbornes are destined to represent their community and demand the respect of others with their strength. They each hope to conquer the world in the name of their kind and become the leader feared by all.

skinlines.name: Heavenscale
skinlines.description: In order to better know their kingdom's subjects, draconic royalty and retinue descend from their palace in the sky, taking on human forms and reveling with the mortals as they usher in the New Year.

skinlines.name: Crystalis Indomitus
skinlines.description: When the Prismae appeared, there were those that learned to hone their magic. But far to the north, the crystals' influence corrupts the very earth itself. Between the fractal undergrowth and iridescent air, creatures join forces with once-human inhabitants in a war against what remains of civilization. Everything will be reflected in the Prismae's image.

skinlines.name: Food Fight
skinlines.description: Both mouthwatering and foe slaughtering, these foods aren't going down without a fight.

skinlines.name: Risen Legends
skinlines.description: Long ago, gods of myth sealed their strength within the four Shards of the Risen: Chaos, Harmony, Patience, and Vigor. Each presented a life-threatening trial to warriors who sought its power, promising to immortalize them in history. To this day, fighters across the land rise to the challenge in hopes of leaving a legacy that even a god will respect.

skinlines.name: Rain Shepherd
skinlines.description: The world is parched, without water and song. Since the frogs lost the power to sing, rains have slowed and moisture is sparse. So frogs have taught a new group to sing: the Rain Shepherds. Clad in special rain gear, they work to replenish the lands and return nature to its formerly lush self.

skinlines.name: Primordian
skinlines.description: Cast from dry land, the Primordians bided their time deep beneath the sea, biding their time for centuries until they could no longer abide the surface-dwellers any longer, nor their abuses of the planet. Thus the Primordian Queen's judgment was made: humanity's era in the sun is over, and that of the Primordians has only just begun.

skinlines.name: World Champions: 2023
skinlines.description: Congratulations to your Worlds winners for 2023: T1!

skinlines.name: Fist Bumps and Festivities
skinlines.description: Time to celebrate!

skinlines.name: Chosen of the Wolf
skinlines.description: When the young warleader Ambessa falls in battle, she is granted a vision of Volrachnun, a hallowed afterlife for worthy followers of the Wolf. All who are welcomed into this haven must join the Eternal Chase, finding bliss in battle and joyfully challenging their fellow chosen warriors in a never-ending hunt.

skinlines.name: Superfans
skinlines.description: Let your fandom flag fly!

skinlines.name: Masque of the Black Rose
skinlines.description: Revelry and luxury reign at the Silken Danse, a masquerade uniting nobles and luminaries from across Runeterra. But in Noxus, the ballroom is a battlefield. A whisper is as sharp as a dagger, and power is traded between pleasantries. Even the reclusive Lady Elise has left her nest to host the event, in service to unseen eyes Watching. Waiting.

skinlines.name: Modern Mythos
skinlines.description: Myths and legends happened long ago, but their echoes are still felt to this day. Beneath the surface of the mundane world, mythical power uplifts a new generation of heroes.

skinlines.name: Dumpling Darlings
skinlines.description: Any pastry mage worth their salt knows no get-together is complete without savory treats. Though their cafe may be new, the art of making dumplings isn'tand these magical chefs are willing to knead, chop, fry, and steam their way to culinary greatness. Just one bite of these doughy delights will make even the grumpiest patron eager to pull up a chair and celebrate.

skinlines.name: Masked Justice
skinlines.description: After destroying its own homeworld, the mad giant Mezzorax searched the galaxy until it found a new planet to invade: the bustling metropolis of Ocono. But now an unlikely group of citizens is fighting back. Empowered by alien Hyperguise suits, they will avenge the lives Mezzorax has stolen and end his reign for good.

skinlines.name: Grand Reckoning
skinlines.description: It is Noxian tradition to celebrate a great victory, and the triumph of strength over weakness. After their successful campaign into Freljordian territory, a Grand Reckoning is held in celebration of the returning General Darius and his warbandsdrawing crowds to every arena in the capital to honor him, and all the renowned Reckoners of years past.

skinlines.name: Fatemakers and Fatebreakers
skinlines.description: In a world entwined with the Weave of Fate, no thread is beyond reach for those bold enough to seize it. To do so, they must seek the Palace of the Weave and confront the Fatemakers, powerful entities entrusted with the warp and weft of destiny. Those who prove themselvescalled Fatebreakerscan rewrite their fortunes... and the shape of things to come.

skinlines.name: Stargazer
skinlines.description: Adept diviners, the Stargazers have long unlocked and safeguarded the secrets of the cosmos within their order's vast library. Using esoteric knowledge and ancient powers, they have shielded their homesphere from countless threats. Yet few among them are prepared to confront an unknown terror emerging from another sphereor even acknowledge its existence.

skinlines.name: Spirit Blossom Springs
skinlines.description: High in the mountains lies a bathhouse where guests go to melt away their worldly cares. This themed retreat, called "Spirit Blossom Springs," is an oasis free of drama. Its welcoming staff and magical steam wash away the burdens of battle and memories best forgotten. There are no heroes or villains hereonly the restful and the rejuvenated.

skinlines.name: Visions of the Fallen
skinlines.description:
Once, we were gods. Now, lost eternally in the disembodied darkness of our imprisonment, we dream of a thousand inevitable, bloody returns and all mankind begging for our divine mercy once more.
In an age lost to legend, this world belonged to the Darkin.
And the Darkin intend to take it back.

skinlines.name: World Champions: 2024
skinlines.description: Congratulations to your Worlds winners for 2024: T1!

skinlines.name: Flora Fatalis
skinlines.description: The Flora Fatalis judges all who venture within its intoxicating reach, beckoning to those with nerve and ambition, luring them close enough to plant the potent seed of its will. Together they adapt and evolve, seeking ever-stronger hosts to empowerand to consume.

skinlines.name: The Eternal Aspects
skinlines.description: For millennia, the formidably powerful Aspects have worked tirelessly from the celestial realm to guide and strengthen Runeterra. Each one claims to be the ultimate manifestation of a universal truth of creationindeed, they seek out mortal hosts worthy and capable of furthering their agendas, enabling them to walk the world in physical form once more.

skinlines.name: Sunken Shadows
skinlines.description: While feuding corsairs vie for dominion over the Umbral Seas, something far older stirs below. Few mortals who brave the depths return, and those who do are changedhaunted by whispers of witches and wraiths, relics and ruins from a world long forgotten by the tides.

skinlines.name: The Laws of Stone
skinlines.description: For almost a thousand years, Demacia has stood as a beacon of hope in a world so often darkened by sorcery and ruthless ambition. The foundation of this noble kingdom lies in the mystery of petricitegleaming stone that can absorb even the most powerful magicfrom mighty fortresses, to resplendent works of art that stir the soul of every proud citizen.

skinlines.name: Petals of Spring
skinlines.description: Deep within the spirit realm lies a garden of myth, where each plant embodies mortal hopes, dreams, and suffering. Gardeners tend to it with sacred care, pruning sorrow and nurturing new blossoms. If all goes well, the Frostpyre flowers bloomsignaling the coming melt of snowand Spring returns, bringing life back to both the garden and the mortal world.

skinlines.name: Aegis Frame
skinlines.description: Caught in the thrall of a dying black hole, one world looks to a neighboring galaxy for sanctuary. To navigate the harsh, uncharted depths of space, they send colossal mechs capable of surviving such a journey to find a new home. When none return, a second mission is mounted, both to carve a new foothold and discover what dangers might await.

skinlines.name: Revenant Reign
skinlines.description: The kingdom has fallen. The dead stir. The Underworld rises. All hail Rex Mortis, the newly-crowned king of death! May his glorious and terrible reign endure forevermore.
